attributes.additional_details:
I experience discrimination on a regular basis. For example...

When I try to rent a car with my seven years no claims bonus and clean license, I cannot.
But the gentleman beside me can with his one year no claims and endorsed points.

When I apply for a bank loan I am refused - my age weighs down my impecible credit score.

Circumstance alone should determine eligibility to services or products, not age, under any circumstances.
